column5: Hey all...Just wanted to tell yas I found some nice ice near me... a solid 3" of good ice... Went out drilled 8 or so holes and dropped the lines for pike... although we didn't get any hits, it was great to see I can now get out for Pike... Also have a nice semi permanent cooler on the ice which you can see in my pics  holds 8 pop but might just need to be expanded, sure does keep em ice cold... lol Here's the cooler boys   and the fishing area:   Well maybe next time I will have some fish with the report... Until then stay safe on the ice and Tight lines  Bill
hey bill you still intrested in the cenetpin combo, havent heard back from you
have u tried some quick strikes good luck out there
Hey bill,im glad you got out for the first ice-fish of the year !!!!   too bad about not getting any fish...oh well next time...cheers
Lotsa ice and no fish?... what's up with that???
Ya what good is ice with no fish pics.I tell ya.you should have used explosives.
the ice is still too thin for explosives mike..., but maybe i could try addin some appo juice to the water...

I was itching to get out so I was cautious and did, and am happy to have gone, even though I didnt get anything... It is early so if ya do venture out be really careful, because most lakes aren't that good right now... Hmmm, will I also be the first to post a SUCCESSFUL ice report this season?
Ya you the man Billy .Now get out there and post some fish pics before someone posts a report with success.
time to get the hut ready .. shouldnt be long till almost all the lakes will be ready
Hehehe I am going to be going in all of 1/2 an hour or so
I see your from burlington.  Is this close to home or did you go north to find this ice?
